name: Graviton (shockdesign)
description:
Can you survive out there in space... using your graviton engine to either attract or repel the asteroids and fuel cells (the latter of which you need to keep going).

Rack up a score and keep yourself in the game for as long as you can.

Now prepackaged with Dosbox for Windows. And can be run on OSX using BoxerApp (http://boxerapp.com)

Just run `GRAVITON.EXE` on the DOS command prompt to run.

Keyboard controls only for the moment. Runs in a proper CGA video mode and can run on your 16 bit DOS machine (if you still have one).

Idea was conceived for the #CGAJAM and will have active development until it's a smooth arcade style game.

Graphics by Marco Maimone.

Code by Rajesh Singh
